infos.value: Argh!
I w-won't let...these wounds stop me...
Hah... Someone's sniffed me out, have they...?
Hmph. You look worse for wear.
Th-that voice... It can't be!
Kitone!
Wh-what are you doing here? Were you not sent to Wezette?
I've returned. Without the king's permission, of course.
But, why...? Come to finish me off while I'm down?
I have no interest in taking your life. Are we not fellow shinobi of Saiga?
In this moment, we are enemies.
Is that honestly what you think?
If that is what you believe, we have nothing left to discuss. I'll kill you here and now.
...What happened?
I went back out of concern for leaving Queen Helena behind. There, I found that she...and Owe...
N-no...
I saw it...with my own eyes. Her face, covered in blood and mud, contorted in pain...
Muraga... That beast...!
It is beyond unforgivable.
I will have my revenge, I swear it! No matter what it takes...
I understand.
I am headed to join Sir Adelard.
He's on his way to join Muraga's group.
He must be informed of Muraga's betrayal before that can happen.
Adelard... The commander of «Nitor»? Can you reach him in time?
I have to try.
I am certain I can do it...although it would be much easier with your help.
Then you will have it.
We'll catch up with Sir Adelard...and then we'll take Muraga's head.
Agreed. Let's go.
